title: One Raise
description: One Raise provides the software, guidance, and support for Australian charities and Not-for-Profits to conduct raffles online.

title: Australian Horizons Foundation
description: Online Charity provides financial support to much needed communities through Rotary Club of Cobar, Rotary Club of Bendigo and many more smaller organisations.

title: Konnect HR
description: Konnect HR is an automation managing employee, document, time-management, attendance, and payroll. Absolutely tailored for any company in the United Arab Emirates.

title: La Cantine Du Faubourg
description: La Cantine du Faubourg is an artistic rendez-vous, a lifestyle statement. The concept relies on five key principles: sound, music, image, art and food.

title: Metadata Computer Systems
description: Metadata UAE is an independent software and hardware vendor that provide a wide range of quality products and services in the United Arab Emirates.

title: Libra Expense Management
description: Libra expense management is a web application tailored for Gulf Contractors Company to manage their petty cash and attendance for labour and staff records.

title: Libra Gold Management
description: Simplifies how a gold store is managed. From the customer, employees, suppliers, products, carats, payment methods, taxes, cost code, accounting, and inventory.
